verses.verse: David's <S%H1732><s%> Psalm of <S%H8416>praise.<s%> I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> thee, my <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H4428>king;<s%> and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee; and I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> and his <S%H1420>greatness<s%> is <S%H369>unsearchable.<s%> <S%H2714><s%>
One <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall <S%H7623>praise<s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> to <S%H1755>another,<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> thy mighty <S%H1369>acts.<s%>
I will <S%H7878>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H1926>honor<s%> of thy <S%H1935>majesty,<s%> and of thy <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H1697>works.<s%>
And men shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H5807>might<s%> of thy terrible <S%H3372>acts:<s%> and I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> thy <S%H1420>greatness.<s%>
They shall abundantly <S%H5042>utter<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> and shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> and full of <S%H7349>compassion;<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3605>all:<s%> and his tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> are <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee.
They shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of thy <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> of thy <S%H1369>power;<s%>
To make <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> his mighty <S%H1369>acts,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H1926>majesty<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
Thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H3605>everlasting<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and thy <S%H4475>dominion<s%> endureth throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5564>upholdeth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and raiseth <S%H2210>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those that be bowed <S%H3721>down.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7663>wait<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee; and <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5414>givest<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> their <S%H400>meat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season.<s%>
Thou <S%H6605>openest<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfiest<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H2416>thing.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H2623>holy<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon him, to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon him in <S%H571>truth.<s%>
He will <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him: he also will <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H7775>cry,<s%> and will <S%H3467>save<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H157>love<s%> him: but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will he <S%H8045>destroy.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
